item.title: CVE-2020-36724|2024-08-04T17:37:06.724Z -- wordable -- wordable%20%E2%80%93%20export%20google%20docs%20to%20wordpress
item.description: The Wordable plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to authentication bypass in versions up to, and including, 3.1.1. This is due to the use of a user supplied hashing algorithm passed to the hash_hmac() function and the use of a loose comparison on the hash which allows an attacker to trick the function into thinking it has a valid hash. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to gain administrator privileges.
